content.raw:
regression after changing the behavior in Visual. Now any values in material script name will override rgba values - otherwise its causing too many issues in material updates. This is somewhat consistent with Ogre except Ogre tries to blend the texture with ambient/diffuse/specular rgb values. 

fixed in e2ae1d8
content.html:
regression after changing the behavior in Visual. Now any values in material script name will override rgba values - otherwise its causing too many issues in material updates. This is somewhat consistent with Ogre except Ogre tries to blend the texture with ambient/diffuse/specular rgb values.

fixed in e2ae1d8
